verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In my life, Lord,
Be glorified, be glorified.
In my life, Lord,
Be glorified today.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In your church, Lord,
Be glorified, be glorified.
In your church, Lord,
Be glorified, today.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In your world, Lord,
Be glorified, Be glorified
in your world, Lord,
Be glorified today
